heroSection.subtitle: Reliable Delivery Worldwide
heroSection.description: Comprehensive solutions for your business, from warehouse to door. Efficient, safe, on time.
heroSection.missionSubtitle: Discover new horizons for your business
heroSection.missionDescription: We offer a full range of logistics services, ensuring reliable and fast delivery of your goods to any part of the world.

servicesSection.subtitle: Our key competencies
servicesSection.title: Our <1>Services</1>
servicesSection.description: We offer a full range of logistics solutions for efficient management of your supplies.

autoTransport.title: Road Freight
autoTransport.description: Flexible and fast delivery of goods by road across the CIS and Europe. Full control at all stages of the route.

seaRiverTransport.title: Sea & River Freight
seaRiverTransport.description: Cost-effective solutions for intercontinental delivery of large batches and oversized cargo.

airFreight.title: Air Freight
airFreight.description: Maximum speed of delivery for urgent, valuable, and perishable goods to anywhere in the world.

warehousing.title: Warehousing & Fulfillment
warehousing.description: Responsible storage, processing, picking, and packaging of orders for your business and e-commerce.

aboutCompanySection.subtitle: Learn more about us
aboutCompanySection.title: About <1>Global Cargo</1>
aboutCompanySection.missionText1: We strive to provide first-class logistics services that help our clients grow and succeed. Our goal is to be not just an executor, but a reliable partner in the supply chain.
aboutCompanySection.missionText2: Based on innovation, responsibility, and an individual approach, we build long-term relationships and ensure flawless execution of every task.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We guarantee the safety of your cargo and adherence to all obligations.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: We optimize routes and processes to save your time and money.

individualApproach.title: Individual approach
individualApproach.description: We develop solutions taking into account the unique needs of each client.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: We strictly adhere to delivery times so that your business runs smoothly.

foundation.title: Company Foundation
foundation.description: Started our journey with organizing local road freight, laying the foundation for reliability and quality.

internationalLaunch.title: Launch of International Freight
internationalLaunch.description: Expanded geography, successfully implementing the first projects for cargo delivery from Europe and China.

newWarehouse.title: Opening of a new A+ class warehouse
newWarehouse.description: Launched a modern warehouse complex to provide a full range of services for cargo storage and processing.

award.title: Logistics Company of the Year Award
award.description: Received a prestigious industry award for innovative solutions and high level of customer service.

aboutCompanySection.ctaText: Ready to discuss your logistics challenges?

casesSection.subtitle: Our experience in action
casesSection.title: Completed <1>Projects</1>
casesSection.description: See examples of successfully completed tasks that demonstrate our expertise and approach to work.

teamSection.subtitle: Our Experts
teamSection.title: Team of <1>Professionals</1>
teamSection.description: Meet the key specialists who ensure the success of your deliveries.

ivan.name: Ivan Petrov
ivan.description: Over 15 years of experience in international logistics. Defines the company's strategic development.

maria.name: Maria Smirnova
maria.description: Will help you find the optimal and most profitable solution for any of your logistics tasks.

alexey.name: Alexey Novikov
alexey.description: Ensures seamless and timely delivery of every cargo.

contactUsSection.subtitle: Stay in touch
contactUsSection.title: Contact <1>Us</1>
contactUsSection.description: Have a question or ready to start a project? Send us a message and we'll get back to you shortly to discuss the details.
contactUsSection.statusDescription: We are always ready to consider new opportunities for cooperation and partnership.

successModal.title: Message Sent!
successModal.description: Thank you for your inquiry! We will contact you within 24 hours.

calculatorSection.subtitle: Tools for your convenience
calculatorSection.title: Tariff Calculator
calculatorSection.disclaimer: * The calculation is preliminary. For an exact calculation, please contact our manager.
calculatorSection.fillAllFields: Fill in all fields to get a calculation.

trackingSection.description: Enter your track number to find out the current status and movement history of your shipment.
